SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT509
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is sent by an instructing party or its authorised representative to an executing party or by an executing party to the instructing party or its authorised representative. It may also be sent by an instructing party to its custodian to inform of an update in the trade status of a previously sent settlement instruction.
This message is used to:
a) advise the status of an order/trade.
b) advise the status of a replacement request
c) advise the status of a cancellation request.
It may also be used to:
a) provide a third party with a copy of the status message being sent
This message may be sent directly or through an ETC service provider between the parties to the deal, or by an ETC service provider.

Validation.Comment: Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
Function must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T86):

Code.Name: CAST
Code.Description: Message reporting on a cancellation request status.

Code.Name: INST
Code.Description: Message reporting on an instruction status.

Code.Name: REST
Code.Description: Message reporting on a replacement status.

Validation.Comment: When present, Sub-function must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T85):

Code.Name: CODU
Code.Description: Message is a copy to a party other than the account owner/account servicer, for information purposes and the message is a duplicate of a message previously sent.

Code.Name: COPY
Code.Description: Message is a copy to a party other than the account owner/account servicer, for information purposes.

Code.Name: DUPL
Code.Description: Message is for information/confirmation purposes. It is a duplicate of a message previously sent.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38).
UTC Indicator must be a valid time expressed as HH[MM] (Error code(s): T39) .
Sign must not be used when UTC Indicator is equal to all zeroes (Error code(s): T14) .
Number (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).

Validation.Qualifiers: ALMR, BASK, BMRB, COMM, INDX, ISSU, LIST, MAST, PREV, PROG, RELA, TRRF
Validation.Comment: Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is CPRC, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25):

Code.Name: CAND
Code.Description: Cancellation has been completed

Code.Name: CANP
Code.Description: Cancellation is pending. It is not known at this time whether cancellation can be affected

Code.Name: DEND
Code.Description: Cancellation will not be executed

Code.Name: EXCH
Code.Description: Cancellation has been received at the stock exchange

Code.Name: INTE
Code.Description: Cancellation has been received at the intermediary

Code.Name: PACK
Code.Description: Cancellation request has been acknowledged for further processing by the account servicer

Code.Name: PARF
Code.DetailedName: Partially filled, cancel accepted for remainder
Code.Description: Order is partially filled, cancellation processing accepted for the remainder

Code.Name: REJT
Code.Description: Cancellation has been rejected for further processing

Code.Name: REPR
Code.Description: Cancellation request is in repair

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is IPRC, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25):

Code.Name: CAN1
Code.DetailedName: Pending Cancellation. Only One Side Input.
Code.Description: Pending cancellation; only one side has been input and a cancellation request has been sent

Code.Name: CAN2
Code.Description: Pending cancellation; both sides have been input, the trade has not yet been matched, and one side has sent a cancellation request

Code.Name: CAN3
Code.DetailedName: Pending Cancellation. Both Sides Input. Matched.
Code.Description: Pending cancellation; both sides have been input, the trade is matched, and one side has sent a cancellation request

Code.Name: CAND
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled

Code.Name: CANO
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled by another party than the instructing party, e.g. market infrastructure such as a Stock Exchange

Code.Name: COSE
Code.Description: Order is fully executed and the confirmation was sent

Code.Name: DONE
Code.DetailedName: Order Partially Filled, and is Done for the Day
Code.Description: Order is partially filled and no further executions forthcoming for the trading day

Code.Name: DONF
Code.DetailedName: Partially Filled, will not be Filled Further
Code.Description: Order is partially filled and no further executions will take place

Code.Name: EXCH
Code.Description: Order has been received at the stock exchange.

Code.Name: EXSE
Code.Description: Order was fully executed and the execution sent.

Code.Name: FORC
Code.Description: The message has been sent automatically by the service provider to notify that settlement will not take place.

Code.Name: INTE
Code.Description: Order has been received at the intermediary

Code.Name: NOTC
Code.Description: Instruction cannot be cancelled as it has already been matched and affirmed

Code.Name: OPOD
Code.Description: Order is open.

Code.Name: OVER
Code.Description: Quantity of financial instrument of the block trade has been overallocated.

Code.Name: PACK
Code.Description: Instruction has been acknowledged by the account servicer

Code.Name: PAFI
Code.DetailedName: Partially Filled Order, Remaining is Warehoused
Code.Description: Order has been partially filled and the remaining quantity is warehoused

Code.Name: PART
Code.Description: Order has been partially cancelled as requested

Code.Name: PPRE
Code.Description: Confirmation of the prepayment has been received (Funds Industry)

Code.Name: REJT
Code.Description: Instruction has been rejected for further processing.

Code.Name: REPR
Code.Description: Instruction is accepted but in repair

Code.Name: SESE
Code.Description: Settlement instruction has been sent to your custodian

Code.Name: SUSP
Code.Description: Trading is suspended by the stock exchange

Code.Name: UNDE
Code.Description: Quantity of financial instrument of the block trade has been under allocated

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is MTCH, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25):

Code.Name: MACH
Code.Description: Instruction has been matched.

Code.Name: NMAT
Code.Description: Instruction has not been matched.

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is AFFM, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25):

Code.Name: AFFI
Code.Description: Confirmation of the trade has been affirmed

Code.Name: NAFI
Code.Description: Confirmation of the trade has not been affirmed

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is RPRC, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25):

Code.Name: DEND
Code.Description: Replacement request cannot be executed

Code.Name: EXCH
Code.Description: Replacement request has been received at the stock exchange.

Code.Name: INTE
Code.Description: Replacement request has been received at intermediary (if not stock exchange)

Code.Name: PACK
Code.Description: Replacement request has been accepted for further processing by the account servicer (technical receipt).

Code.Name: PART
Code.Description: Order is partially filled, replacement processing accepted for the remaining

Code.Name: PEND
Code.Description: Replacement request is pending

Code.Name: REJT
Code.Description: Replacement has been rejected for further processing

Code.Name: REPL
Code.Description: Replacement request has been completed.

Code.Name: REPR
Code.Description: Replacement request is in repair.

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is REJT, Reason Code must contain the following code (Error code(s): K24):

Code.Name: ADEA
Code.Description: Instruction was received after the Receiver's deadline.

Code.Name: ASTM
Code.DetailedName: Agreement Start Date Invalid Or Missing
Code.Description: Agreement start date is missing.

Code.Name: BATC
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid processing batch, ie, daytime/realtime while only possible to settle in overnight batch

Code.Name: BPRJ
Code.Description: Bid or order price not within the price bands (high - low).

Code.Name: BUSE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid type of order.

Code.Name: CADE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid repurchase call delay.

Code.Name: CASH
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid cash account.

Code.Name: CASY
Code.Description: Impossible standing arrangements override instruction for the cash settlement system.

Code.Name: COMC
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid commercialisation contract.

Code.Name: DDAT
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement date, ie, date is not a settlement date for the instructed market, or settlement date is too old

Code.Name: DDEA
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid deal price.

Code.Name: DEPT
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid Place of Settlement.

Code.Name: DLNP
Code.Description: Declarations applicable to the issue are missing.

Code.Name: DMON
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement amount.

Code.Name: DQUA
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement quantity.

Code.Name: DSEC
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid financial instrument identification, ie, invalid ISIN, or security not eligible at the instructed market

Code.Name: DTRD
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid trade date.

Code.Name: EMBQ
Code.DetailedName: Exceeds Maximum Bid or Order Quantity
Code.Description: Bid or order quantity instructed exceeds the investment limits or maximum number of securities that can be held under applicable law.

Code.Name: FDNP
Code.Description: Funding details is missing in bid or order instruction.

Code.Name: FEEE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid fee or commission.

Code.Name: FORF
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid forfeit repurchase amount.

Code.Name: ICAG
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid receiving or delivering agent.

Code.Name: ICUS
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid receiving or delivering custodian.

Code.Name: IEXE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid buyer or seller.

Code.Name: IIND
Code.Description: Unrecognised,invalid or missing Common Reference.

Code.Name: INBV
Code.Description: Bid or order value provided is incorrect.

Code.Name: INDL
Code.Description: Declaration provided in the instruction is not complete.

Code.Name: INFD
Code.Description: Funding not sufficient to process the bid or order.

Code.Name: INNA
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid SLA agreed narrative information.

Code.Name: INVE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid investor party. May be used by an executing party to reject an allocation for an investor (or portfolio) for which it is not authorised to act.

Code.Name: LATE
Code.Description: Instruction was received after market deadline.

Code.Name: LEOG
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid letter of guarantee indicator instructed.

Code.Name: MLOT
Code.Description: Bid or order quantity not in multiples of lot size.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason

Code.Name: NCRR
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement amount currency.

Code.Name: NRGM
Code.Description: Cancellation request has been rejected since more than one instruction match to the cancellation criteria

Code.Name: NRGN
Code.Description: Cancellation request has been rejected since the instruction could not be found

Code.Name: ODNP
Code.Description: Order entry date is missing.

Code.Name: PHYS
Code.Description: Physical settlement is impossible for the instructed financial instrument.

Code.Name: PLCE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid place of trade.

Code.Name: PLIS
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid place of listing. Used when the security identified is not listed on the market supplied.

Code.Name: QUNP
Code.Description: Quantity unit type is missing.

Code.Name: REFE
Code.Description: Instruction has a reference identical to another previously received instruction

Code.Name: REPA
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid repurchase amount.

Code.Name: REPO
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid repurchase rate.

Code.Name: REPP
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid repurchase premium amount.

Code.Name: RERT
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid repurchase rate type.

Code.Name: RSPR
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid repurchase spread rate.

Code.Name: RTGS
Code.Description: Impossible to use the RTGS system instructed (NRTG or YRTG)

Code.Name: SAFE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid message sender's safekeeping account.

Code.Name: SETR
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement transaction type (relates to the settlement transaction type codes available for sequence E field 22F, qualifier SETR).

Code.Name: SETS
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement system/method instructed.

Code.Name: TERM
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid closing date/time.

Code.Name: TNAR
Code.DetailedName: Transaction Notice Already Accepted or Rejected
Code.Description: A message with the same Transaction Notice Reference, Market Member, and Intermediary has already been processed.

Code.Name: TNIU
Code.Description: The combination of the Transaction Notice Reference, Market Member, and Intermediary is unknown.

Code.Name: TQBT
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid total block quantity. Used when the total block quantity supplied in an allocation is different from the advised (ADVI) quantity supplied in the client advice of execution.

Code.Name: TQHI
Code.DetailedName: Traded Quantity Higher than Original Order Quantity
Code.Description: Market member executed the order exceeding the requested quantity.

Code.Name: TQNP
Code.Description: Traded Securities Quantity is missing.

Code.Name: TXST
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid tax status of the securities instructed.

Code.Name: ULNK
Code.Description: Message was not recognised - unknown linked reference.

Code.Name: VASU
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid variable rate support (repo).

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is NMAT, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24):

Code.Name: ACRU
Code.Description: Accrued interest amount does not match.

Code.Name: ADEA
Code.Description: Instruction was received after the Receiver's deadline.

Code.Name: CADE
Code.Description: Repurchase call delay does not match.

Code.Name: CHAR
Code.Description: Charges amount does not match.

Code.Name: CMIS
Code.Description: No potential match has been found.

Code.Name: CPCA
Code.Description: Your instruction is unmatched. Your counterparty has cancelled their instruction.

Code.Name: DDAT
Code.Description: Settlement date does not match.

Code.Name: DDEA
Code.Description: Deal price does not match.

Code.Name: DEAL
Code.Description: Deal amount does not match.

Code.Name: DELN
Code.Description: Direction of the trade does not match. Counterparty expects a delivery from you, not a receipt or vice versa.

Code.Name: DEPT
Code.Description: Place of settlement does not match.

Code.Name: DMON
Code.Description: Settlement amount does not match.

Code.Name: DQUA
Code.Description: Quantity of financial instrument does not match.

Code.Name: DSEC
Code.Description: Financial instrument identification does not match, ie, ISIN differs, or Financial Instrument Attributes differs

Code.Name: DTRD
Code.Description: Trade date does not match.

Code.Name: EXEC
Code.Description: Executing broker's commission does not match.

Code.Name: FORF
Code.Description: Forfeit repurchase amount does not match.

Code.Name: INVE
Code.Description: Investor party does not match.

Code.Name: LATE
Code.Description: Instruction was received after market deadline.

Code.Name: LEOG
Code.Description: Counterparty is for settlement through Letter of Guarantee (L/G), your instruction is not, or vice versa

Code.Name: MCAN
Code.Description: The corresponding matching record has been cancelled.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for the reason

Code.Name: PHYS
Code.Description: Counterparty is for physical settlement, your instruction is not, or vice versa

Code.Name: PLCE
Code.Description: Place of trade does not match

Code.Name: PLIS
Code.Description: Place of listing does not match.

Code.Name: PODU
Code.Description: Possible duplicate instruction

Code.Name: REPA
Code.Description: Repurchase amount does not match

Code.Name: REPO
Code.Description: Repurchase rate does not match.

Code.Name: REPP
Code.Description: Repurchase premium amount does not match.

Code.Name: RERT
Code.Description: Repurchase rate type does not match.

Code.Name: RSPR
Code.Description: Repurchase spread rate does not match.

Code.Name: RTGS
Code.Description: Counterparty is for RTGS settlement system, you are for non-RTGS, or vice versa

Code.Name: SAFE
Code.Description: Safekeeping account used as matching criteria on the market concerned (buyer/seller's account, direct client's account at the receiving/delivering agent, receiving or delivering agent's account at the CSD) does not match

Code.Name: SETR
Code.Description: Settlement transaction type does not match (relates to the settlement transaction type codes available for sequence E field 22F, qualifier SETR).

Code.Name: SETS
Code.Description: Counterparty disagrees with the settlement system/method instructed, eg, Instruction is to settle using settlement system/method A. Counterparty expects settlement to occur using settlement system/method B

Code.Name: TERM
Code.Description: Closing date/time does not match.

Code.Name: TQBT
Code.Description: Total block quantity does not match.

Code.Name: TXST
Code.Description: Disagreement on the tax status of the securities to be settled

Code.Name: VASU
Code.Description: Variable rate support does not match (repo).

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is NAFI, Reason Code must contain the following code (Error code(s): K24):

Code.Name: NAFF
Code.Description: Counterparty has not affirmed.

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is REPR, Reason Code must contain the following code (Error code(s): K24):

Code.Name: ADEA
Code.Description: Instruction was received after the Receiver's deadline.

Code.Name: BATC
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid processing batch, ie, daytime/realtime while only possible to settle in overnight batch

Code.Name: BUSE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid type of order.

Code.Name: CADE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid repurchase call delay.

Code.Name: CASH
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid cash account.

Code.Name: CASY
Code.Description: Impossible standing arrangements override instruction for the cash settlement system.

Code.Name: COMC
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid commercialisation contract.

Code.Name: DDAT
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement date, ie, date is not a settlement date for the instructed market, or settlement date is too old

Code.Name: DDEA
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid deal price.

Code.Name: DEPT
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid Place of Settlement.

Code.Name: DMON
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement amount.

Code.Name: DQUA
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement quantity.

Code.Name: DSEC
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid financial instrument identification (i.e. invalid ISIN, security not eligible at the instructed market...)

Code.Name: DTRD
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid trade date.

Code.Name: FEEE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid fee or commission.

Code.Name: FORF
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid forfeit repurchase amount.

Code.Name: ICAG
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid receiving or delivering agent.

Code.Name: ICUS
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid receiving or delivering custodian.

Code.Name: IEXE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid buyer or seller.

Code.Name: IIND
Code.Description: Unrecognised,invalid or missing Common Reference.

Code.Name: INNA
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid SLA agreed narrative information.

Code.Name: LEOG
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid letter of guarantee indicator instructed.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason

Code.Name: NCRR
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement amount currency.

Code.Name: NRGM
Code.Description: Cancellation request is in repair since more than one instruction match to the cancellation criteria

Code.Name: NRGN
Code.Description: Cancellation request is in repair since the instruction could not be found

Code.Name: PHYS
Code.Description: Physical settlement is impossible for the instructed financial instrument.

Code.Name: PLCE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid place of trade.

Code.Name: REPA
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid repurchase amount.

Code.Name: REPO
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid repurchase rate.

Code.Name: REPP
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid repurchase premium amount.

Code.Name: RERT
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid repurchase rate type.

Code.Name: RSPR
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid repurchase spread rate.

Code.Name: RTGS
Code.Description: Impossible to use the RTGS system instructed (NRTG or YRTG)

Code.Name: SAFE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid message sender's safekeeping account.

Code.Name: SETR
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement transaction type (relates to the settlement transaction type codes available for sequence E field 22F, qualifier SETR).

Code.Name: SETS
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid settlement system/method instructed.

Code.Name: TERM
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid closing date/time.

Code.Name: TXST
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid tax status of the securities instructed.

Code.Name: ULNK
Code.Description: Message was not recognised - unknown linked reference.

Code.Name: VASU
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid variable rate support (repo).

Validation.Comment: Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38).
If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is SETT, Date Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K98):

Code.Name: SEOP
Code.Description: Settlement is to be completed at the seller's option.

Code.Name: TBAT
Code.Description: Settlement is to be completed as a result of a 'to be announced' trade.

Code.Name: WDIS
Code.Description: Settlement is to be completed when the security is distributed.

Code.Name: WIDI
Code.Description: Settlement is to be completed when the security is issued or when distributed.

Code.Name: WISS
Code.Description: Settlement is to be completed when the security is issued.

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is TRAD, Date Code must contain the following code (Error code(s): K98):

Code.Name: VARI
Code.Description: Partial trades have occurred over a period of two or more days.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
When Qualifier is BUSE, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: BUYI
Code.Description: Transaction is a purchase of financial instrument

Code.Name: CROF
Code.Description: Transaction is a cross from (Funds Industry).

Code.Name: CROT
Code.Description: Transaction is a cross to (Funds Industry)

Code.Name: DIVR
Code.Description: Transaction is a reinvestment of dividend order (Funds Industry. Not to be used for corporate actions)

Code.Name: FPOO
Code.Description: Transaction is an FPO (Follow on Public Offer) bid or order.

Code.Name: IPOO
Code.Description: Transaction is an IPO (Initial Public Offering) bid or order.

Code.Name: IPPO
Code.Description: Transaction is an IPP (Institutional Placement Programme) bid or order.

Code.Name: REDM
Code.Description: Transaction is a redemption of funds

Code.Name: SELL
Code.Description: Transaction is a sale of financial instrument

Code.Name: SUBS
Code.Description: Transaction is a subscription to funds

Code.Name: SWIF
Code.Description: Transaction is a change of an investment from one sub-fund to another sub-fund

Code.Name: SWIT
Code.Description: Transaction is a change of an investment from one sub-fund to another sub-fund

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is PROC, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: CLOP
Code.Description: Trade is to close a position.

Code.Name: OPEP
Code.Description: Trade is to open a position.

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is RPOR, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: EXCH
Code.Description: Trade details are to be reported to a stock exchange. This stock exchange is identified in the other parties sequence

Code.Name: TRRE
Code.Description: Trade details are to be reported to a regulatory organisation. This stock regulatory organisation is identified in the other parties sequence

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is SETG, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: GENS
Code.Description: Specifies if the ETC service provider is to generate a settlement instruction

Code.Name: NOGE
Code.DetailedName: Not Instruction Generation by ETC Provider
Code.Description: Specifies if the ETC service provider is not to generate a settlement instruction where a previous agreement to do so exists

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is PAYM, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: APMT
Code.Description: Against payment.

Code.Name: FREE
Code.Description: Free.

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Proprietary code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'.(Error code(s): T26).
In option B, when Data Source Scheme is not present, Account Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Errorcode(s): K97):

Code.Name: ABRD
Code.Description: Financial instruments are held in a safekeeping account abroad.

Code.Name: CEND
Code.Description: Financial instrument in the safekeeping account are held in one location.

Code.Name: DVPA
Code.Description: Safekeeping account is used for settlement on delivery or collect on delivery basis.

Code.Name: FUNG
Code.Description: Financial instruments in the safekeeping account are fungible.

Code.Name: MARG
Code.Description: Account is used when financing is by the broker/dealer.

Code.Name: NFUN
Code.Description: Financial instruments in the safekeeping account are not fungible.

Code.Name: PHYS
Code.Description: Financial instruments in the safekeeping account are in physical form.

Code.Name: SHOR
Code.Description: Account is used for short sale orders.

Option.Name: S
Option.Specification: (Qualifier) (Data Source Scheme) (Type of ID) (Country Code) (Alternate ID)

Validation.Qualifiers: BRCR, BUYR, CLBR, DEAG, INBR, INVE, REAG, RQBR, SELL, STBR
Validation.Comment: Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line .(Error code(s): T26)

Validation.Qualifiers: BRCR, BUYR, CLBR, DEAG, INBR, INVE, REAG, RQBR, SELL, STBR
Validation.Comment: Proprietary code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line .(Error code(s): T26).

Validation.Qualifiers: BRCR, BUYR, CLBR, DEAG, INBR, INVE, REAG, RQBR, SELL, STBR
Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Country Code must be a valid ISO country code (Error code(s): T73).

Alternate ID (Format Option S) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line .(Error code(s): T26).
If Data Source Scheme is not present, Type of ID must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K95):

Code.Name: ARNU
Code.Description: Number assigned by a government agency to identify foreign nationals.

Code.Name: CCPT
Code.Description: Number assigned by a passport authority.

Code.Name: CHTY
Code.Description: Number assigned to a tax exempt entity.

Code.Name: CORP
Code.Description: Number assigned to a corporate entity.

Code.Name: DRLC
Code.Description: Number assigned to a driver's licence.

Code.Name: FIIN
Code.Description: Number assigned to a foreign investor (other than the alien number).

Code.Name: TXID
Code.Description: Number assigned by a tax authority to an entity.

Validation.Comment: In option B, when Data Source Scheme is not present, Account Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K97):

Code.Name: ABRD
Code.Description: Financial instruments are held in a safekeeping account abroad.

Code.Name: CEND
Code.Description: Financial instrument in the safekeeping account are held in one location.

Code.Name: DVPA
Code.Description: Safekeeping account is used for settlement on delivery or collect on delivery basis.

Code.Name: FUNG
Code.Description: Financial instruments in the safekeeping account are fungible.

Code.Name: MARG
Code.Description: Account is used when financing is by the broker/dealer.

Code.Name: NFUN
Code.Description: Financial instruments in the safekeeping account are not fungible.

Code.Name: PHYS
Code.Description: Financial instruments in the safekeeping account are in physical form.

Code.Name: SHOR
Code.Description: Account is used for short sale orders.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38).
Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26)
If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is INCA, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: ELIG
Code.Description: MiFID classification of counterparty. Eligible customers are the most sophisticated level of investor, able to opt out of some the protections afforded by conduct of business rules defined under MiFID.

Code.Name: PROF
Code.Description: MiFID classification of counterparty. Professional customers are, for example, investment firms, credit institutions, insurance companies.

Code.Name: RETL
Code.Description: MiFID classification of counterparty. Retail customers are the least sophisticated level of investor.

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is TRCA, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: AGEN
Code.Description: Party is trading on behalf of his client.

Code.Name: BAGN
Code.DetailedName: Acting as Agent for Customer and Other Person
Code.Description: Party is acting as an agent for both customer and another person.

Code.Name: CAGN
Code.Description: Party is crossing on behalf of his client.

Code.Name: CPRN
Code.Description: Party is crossing for his own account.

Code.Name: OAGN
Code.DetailedName: Acting as Agent for Person Other than Customer
Code.Description: Party is acting as an agent for a person other than a customer.

Code.Name: PRAG
Code.DetailedName: Acting as Agent for Some Executions and Principal
Code.Description: Party is acting as an agent for some executions and principal for others.

Code.Name: PRIN
Code.Description: Party is trading for his own account.

Code.Name: RISP
Code.Description: Party is trading as a riskless principal, that is, the order to buy (sell) has been simultaneously offset by an order to sell (buy) with another party.

Validation.Qualifiers: AFCA, CANC, DBAM, ORDR, PREX, REMA, REPL
Validation.Comment: Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).

Validation.Qualifiers: AFCA, CANC, DBAM, ORDR, PREX, REMA, REPL
Validation.Comment: The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum allowed for the specified currency (Error code(s): C03)

Validation.Qualifiers: AFCA, CANC, DBAM, ORDR, PREX, REMA, REPL
Validation.Comment: When Sign is present, Amount must not be zero (Error code(s): T14).
In option B, Amount Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K90):

Code.Name: ACTU
Code.Description: Price expressed as an amount of currency per unit or per share.

Code.Name: DISC
Code.Description: Price expressed as a discount amount.

Code.Name: PREM
Code.Description: Price expressed as a premium.

Validation.Comment: Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
In option A, Percentage Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K90):

Code.Name: DISC
Code.Description: Price expressed as the number of percentage points below par, for example, a discount price of 2.0% equals a price of 98 when par is 100.

Code.Name: PRCT
Code.Description: Price expressed as a percentage of par.

Code.Name: PREM
Code.Description: Price expressed as the number of percentage points above par, for example, a premium price of 2.0% equals a price of 102 when par is 100.

Code.Name: YIEL
Code.Description: Price expressed as a yield.

Validation.Qualifiers: AFCA, CANC, ORDR, PREX, REMA, REPL
Validation.Comment: Quantity Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K36):

Code.Name: AMOR
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the current amortised face amount of a bond, for example, a periodic reduction/increase of a bond's principal amount.

Code.Name: FAMT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the face amount, that is, the principal, of a debt instrument.

Code.Name: UNIT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as a number, eg, a number of shares.

Option.Name: B
Option.Specification: (Identification Of Security)(Description Of Security) | (Description Of Security)

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)

Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s):T26).

Proprietary code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s):T26).

fieldvalidation.name: U08
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid syntax, format, code word in tag 119(Validation Flag). Allowed value is ISLFIN."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-35B-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-35B-A $value + " is not a valid Security Identification. Required format is ISIN1!e12!c"
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: $value + " is not a valid Security Identification. Required format is ISIN1!e12!c"

fieldvalidation.name: FB-35B-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Not a valid Security Identification. Required format is ISIN1!e12!c";

fieldvalidation.name: C1
fieldvalidation.comment: C1 "Within each occurrence of subsequence A2a Reason, the qualifier in field 24B must be the same as the code word (Status Code) used with the appropriate qualifier in field 25D of its surrounding subsequence A2 Status. If the Data Source Scheme is present in field :25D:: then the conditional rule does not apply."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Within each occurrence of subsequence A2a Reason, the qualifier in field 24B must be the same as the code word (Status Code) used with the appropriate qualifier in field 25D of its surrounding subsequence A2 Status. If the Data Source Scheme is present in field :25D:: then the conditional rule does not apply."

fieldvalidation.name: C2
fieldvalidation.comment: C2 "In sequence B, either a quantity (field :36B::) or an amount (field :19A::) must be present, but not both."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence B, either a quantity (field :36B::) or an amount (field :19A::) must be present, but not both."

fieldvalidation.name: C3
fieldvalidation.comment: In sequence B, if either Deal Price (field 90a::DEAL) or Original Ordered Quantity (field :36B::ORDR) are present more than once then Buy/Sell Indicator (field :22H::BUSE) must be present with Indicator code FPOO or IPOO or IPPO (Error code(s): E75).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence B, if either Deal Price (field 90a::DEAL) or Original Ordered Quantity (field :36B::ORDR) are present more than once then Buy/Sell Indicator (field :22H::BUSE) must be present with Indicator code FPOO or IPOO or IPPO (Error code(s): E75)."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-22a-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-22a-A If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is PRIR, Indicator must contain a numerical value in the range 0001 - 9999 where 0001 refers to the highest priority.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is PRIR, Indicator must contain a numerical value in the range 0001 - 9999 where 0001 refers to the highest priority."
